tours.title: Abu Dhabi City Tour
tours.description: Discover the best of Abu Dhabi as we take you to iconic landmarks like the breathtaking Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, the luxurious Emirates Palace Hotel, and the vibrant Heritage Village.
tours.description2: Discover the ultimate Abu Dhabi City Tour with convenient pickup and drop-off right from your location in Dubai! Travel in comfort and style as our professional drivers take you on a seamless journey in our spotless, well-maintained vehicles. Explore the best of Abu Dhabi, visiting iconic landmarks like the majestic Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, the opulent Emirates Palace Hotel, and the culturally rich Heritage Village. Savor the local charm with a stop at the Dates Market, and capture stunning photos outside the iconic Ferrari World. Embark on an unforgettable adventure in Abu Dhabi – a day full of memories awaits!

inclusions.professional_guide: Professional Guided Tour of Abu Dhabi
inclusions.sheikh_zayed_mosque: Sheikh Zayed Mosque (1 Hour 30 Minutes Stop)
inclusions.marina_mall: Marina Mall of Abu Dhabi (Drive Through)
inclusions.dropoff: Drop Off To Your Home / Hotel

tours.title: Private Half Day Dubai City Tour
tours.description: Discover the enchanting allure of Dubai on our Private Half Day City Tour!
tours.description2: Unveil the captivating charm of Dubai with our Private Half-Day City Tour! Discover the seamless fusion of tradition and modernity as you travel in a pristine, comfortable vehicle accompanied by a knowledgeable guide. Glide across scenic waterways on a traditional Abra ride, immerse yourself in the lively Gold and Spice Souks, and stroll through the historic lanes of Bastakiya. Admire renowned landmarks such as Jumeirah Beach and Jumeirah Mosque, and capture breathtaking photos with the iconic Burj Al Arab as your backdrop. Join us for an extraordinary journey that captures the heart and soul of this dazzling city!
tours.title2: Private Half Day Dubai City Tour

pick.pickup_dropoff: Convenient pick-up and drop-off from Dubai hotels for a hassle-free experience.
pick.rulers_palace: Photo stop at the Ruler's Palace to admire its impressive architecture and learn about Dubai's governance.
pick.bastakiya: Visit the historic Bastakiya district, featuring narrow lanes, wind towers, and Arabian architecture. Optional visit to Dubai Museum in Al Fahidi Fort.
pick.abra_ride: Enchanting abra ride along Dubai Creek, offering scenic views of the skyline and waterfront.
pick.spice_souk_gold_souk: Browse the aromatic Spice Souk and the dazzling Gold Souk for unique finds and souvenirs.
pick.jumeirah_beach: Enjoy stunning views of the Arabian Gulf from Jumeirah Beach, a popular public beach.
pick.burj_al_arab_photo_stop: Photo opportunity with the iconic Burj Al Arab hotel as the backdrop.
pick.palm_jumeirah_island: Explore Palm Jumeirah Island, featuring luxurious villas, hotels, and attractions.
pick.atlantis_photo_stop: Photo stop at the magnificent Atlantis, The Palm resort.
pick.dubai_marina: End the tour with scenic views of Dubai Marina, featuring modern skyscrapers, yachts, and promenades.

tours.title: Full Day Dubai City Tour with Burj Khalifa
tours.description: Experience the ultimate Dubai adventure with our Full Day City Tour, including a visit to the iconic Burj Khalifa!
tours.title2: Full Day Dubai City Tour with Burj Khalifa
tours.description2: Embark on the ultimate Dubai adventure with our Full-Day City Tour, featuring a visit to the world-famous Burj Khalifa! Guided by an expert tour guide, dive into the vibrant mix of tradition and innovation that defines this extraordinary city. Wander through historic gems like Old Dubai, the Gold Souk, and the Spice Souk, then marvel at modern icons such as the Burj Al Arab and the Museum of the Future. Enjoy a serene Abra ride across Dubai Creek and shop to your heart's content at Dubai Mall. The highlight of your day is entry to the Burj Khalifa's breathtaking 124th and 125th floors during non-prime hours—an experience like no other! With hassle-free pickup and drop-off, this seamless journey promises unforgettable memories. Don't miss out on this incredible exploration of Dubai's wonders!

tours.title: Half Day Dubai City Tour
tours.description: Discover the magic of Dubai in just half a day! Join our Half Day Dubai City Tour for an unforgettable experience filled with iconic sights and rich culture.
tours.description2: Uncover the magic of Dubai in just half a day with our Half-Day Dubai City Tour! This unforgettable journey offers the perfect blend of iconic landmarks and rich culture. Sit back and relax with seamless pickup and drop-off in our immaculate vehicles, accompanied by a knowledgeable guide who will share fascinating stories and insights along the way. Admire breathtaking sights such as Jumeirah Beach, the iconic Burj Al Arab, and the majestic Atlantis Hotel, all from prime photo vantage points. Cruise through the vibrant Dubai Creek, explore exquisite Islamic art, and marvel at the grandeur of Dubai Mall and the towering Burj Khalifa. Ideal for those short on time but eager to experience the best of this dazzling city. Book your adventure now and make every moment count!

tours.title: Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque Tour
tours.description: Experience the awe-inspiring beauty of the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque on an exclusive private tour!
tours.description2: Immerse yourself in the awe-inspiring beauty of the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque on an exclusive private tour! Designed for groups of up to 6, this personalized experience offers the perfect way to explore one of the world's largest and most magnificent mosques in absolute comfort and style. Be mesmerized by the mosque's stunning architecture, intricate details, and serene atmosphere, while our expert guide shares captivating insights into its history and significance. Whether you're visiting with family, friends, or loved ones, this bespoke journey promises to create unforgettable memories. Don't miss the chance to experience this iconic landmark like never before. Book your tour now for a truly unique and enriching adventure!

pick.pickup_dropoff: Convenient pick-up and drop-off services from anywhere in Dubai for a seamless experience.
pick.sheikh_zayed_grand_mosque: Visit the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, an architectural marvel that showcases Islamic design at its finest.
pick.learn_islamic_culture: Gain a deeper understanding of the Islamic traditions, culture, and history during your tour.
pick.president_memory: Learn about the former President of the UAE, whose vision led to the construction of the mosque.
pick.photo_sessions: Stop for multiple photo opportunities to capture the beauty of the mosque and its surroundings.

tours.title: Private Abu Dhabi City Tour
tours.description: Discover the vibrant heart of Abu Dhabi on our exclusive Private City Tour!
tours.description2: Experience the vibrant heart of Abu Dhabi on our exclusive Private City Tour! Enjoy hassle-free pickup and drop-off from your location in our spotless vehicles, and embark on an unforgettable 8 to 9-hour adventure. Marvel at the grandeur of the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, indulge in the luxury of Emirates Palace Hotel, and immerse yourself in the rich local culture at Heritage Village. Stroll through the lively Dates Market, and capture stunning photos at the iconic Ferrari World. From cultural landmarks to modern marvels, this tour offers the best of Abu Dhabi. Book your private tour today for a truly exceptional experience!

tours.description2: Discover the iconic Burj Al Arab like never before with our exclusive 90-minute inside tour! While pickup and drop-off are not included in the ticket price, convenient transportation options can be arranged for your convenience. Don't miss out on the opportunity to create unforgettable memories at one of Dubai's most iconic landmarks!

tours.title: Al Ain City Tour
tours.description: Embark on an unforgettable adventure with our Al Ain City Tour from Dubai!
tours.description2: Discover the beauty of Al Ain, the Garden City of the UAE, with our comprehensive tour! Begin with a convenient pick-up from your hotel or residence, followed by a scenic drive to Al Ain. Marvel at the stunning views from Jabel Hafeet, relax in the therapeutic Hot Water Springs, and explore the fascinating Al Ain Zoo (ticket not included). Step back in time at the Al Ain Museum and Fort, wander through the lush Al Ain Oasis, and experience the traditional Camel Market. This tour offers a perfect blend of nature, history, and culture!

inclusions.transportation: Pick-up & Drop-off from your Hotel / Residence

tours.title: Dubai Walking Tour
tours.description: Join us for an unforgettable journey through the heart of Old Dubai, guided by our professional tour guide.
tours.description2: Embark on an unforgettable journey through the heart of Old Dubai with our expert guide. Dive into the rich culture and history as you wander through the charming Al Fahidi neighborhood and the historic Al Bastakiya. Enjoy a traditional abra ride across the sparkling Creek, followed by a visit to the famous Gold and Spice Souks, where you can shop to your heart's content. The adventure begins at Al Ghubaiba Metro Station—don't miss this chance to explore the magic of Dubai's past! Book your spot today!

tours.title: Abu Dhabi Tour with Temple Visit
tours.description: Experience the perfect blend of culture and spirituality with our Abu Dhabi Tour featuring a visit to the magnificent temple!
tours.description2: Embark on a unique journey through Abu Dhabi that combines cultural exploration with spiritual discovery! Our tour begins with a comfortable pickup from your location, followed by a scenic drive along Sheikh Zayed Road. Marvel at the architectural wonder of Sheikh Zayed Mosque, experience the luxury of Emirates Palace Hotel, and immerse yourself in the rich heritage at Heritage Village. Capture stunning photos at Jumeirah Etihad Tower and Sheikh's Palace, explore the Islamic Art Museum, and enjoy a drive through Marina Mall. Visit the vibrant Dates Market before experiencing the serenity of the newly opened temple (Note: Temple is closed on Mondays). This comprehensive tour offers the perfect blend of modern marvels and spiritual discovery!
tours.title2: Abu Dhabi Tour with Temple Visit

Experience the architectural marvel of Palm Jumeirah Island, take a photo stop at Atlantis Hotel, and marvel at the Dubai Marina skyline. Drive through Dubai Mall and Burj Khalifa, visit the Islamic Art Gallery, and see the Ruler's Palace before returning to your hotel or residence.

tours.description: Step back in time and explore the rich heritage and culture of Old Dubai!
tours.description2: Immerse yourself in the authentic charm of Old Dubai with our cultural tour! Begin with a convenient pick-up from anywhere in Dubai, followed by a visit to the historic Dubai Creek. Explore the traditional Al Bastakia quarter, discover the rich history at Dubai Museum, and experience a traditional Abra boat ride across the creek. Wander through the vibrant Spice and Gold Souqs, visit the Heritage Village to learn about Emirati traditions, admire the stunning Jumeirah Mosque, and explore the Islamic Art Museum. This tour offers a perfect blend of history, culture, and tradition!

tours.title: Burj Khalifa Dubai
tours.description: Experience the breathtaking views from the world's tallest building!
tours.description2: Experience the awe-inspiring views from the world's tallest building! Your ticket includes access to the 124th Floor Observation Deck, where you'll enjoy a 30-minute tour with panoramic views of Dubai. Please note that transfers are not included - the best way to reach is through public transportation (taxis, metro) or you can book private transfers separately. Remember to bring your passport copy or Emirates ID for entry. For visits between 4:30 PM to 7:30 PM, adult rate is 200 AED and child rate is 160 AED. Please specify your preferred time slot in the special request section when booking.

inclusions.observation_deck: Entrance Ticket to 124th Floor Observation Deck

important_notes.transfers: This tour doesn't include transfers, the best and cheapest way to reach is through public transportation, i.e (Taxis, Metro etc.) or you can book private transfers from us, just send us request
important_notes.id_requirement: Passport copy / Emirates ID is mandatory to carry during this trip
important_notes.peak_hours: Adult rate will be 200 AED and Child rate will be 160 AED, if you are booking between 4:30 PM to 7:30 PM
important_notes.time_slot: Please mention the required time slots for Burj Khalifa in special request section while making the booking, we'll try our best to get your desired slot or will provide you the best available options
important_notes.availability: Burj Khalifa Tickets are subject to Availability

cancellation_policy.non_cancellable: This tour is non cancellable / Non amendable tour
cancellation_policy.payment: This booking can only be confirm after receiving the payment to our bank. (bank details will send to your email and you have 24 hours to send it)
cancellation_policy.no_refund: Once booked no refund will be provided
cancellation_policy.time_slot_confirmation: If we are not able to book the tickets as per your desired time slot we'll not make the booking until unless we get the confirmation from your end, if you don't agree to the time slot provided by us we'll not make the booking

tours.title: Helicopter Tour
tours.description: Experience Dubai's iconic landmarks from a breathtaking aerial perspective!
tours.description2: Soar above Dubai's most iconic landmarks in a thrilling helicopter tour! Experience breathtaking aerial views of the city's architectural marvels, including the stunning Atlantis The Palm Hotel, the luxurious Burj Al Arab, and the magnificent Burj Khalifa. Fly over the man-made wonders of The World and Palm Jumeirah islands, and take in the spectacular Dubai Marina skyline. This unforgettable experience offers a unique perspective of Dubai's most famous attractions from the sky!

inclusions.burj_al_arab: Burj Al Arab The 7 Star Hotel

tours.title: Hot Air Balloon
tours.description: Experience the magic of a sunrise hot air balloon ride over the Dubai desert!
tours.description2: Embark on an unforgettable adventure with our Hot Air Balloon experience! Soar above the Dubai desert for 45 to 60 minutes, witnessing a breathtaking sunrise over the desert conservation area. Before your flight, enjoy light refreshments to start your day. After landing, you'll receive a flight certificate to commemorate your experience. Available every day with convenient pick-up and drop-off service from anywhere in Dubai.

inclusions.flight_duration: 45 to 60 Minutes Flight Over The Dubai Desert
inclusions.certificate: Flight Certificate Will Be Provided After The Landing

availability.transportation: Pick-up & Drop-off Included from anywhere in Dubai

tours.title: Dubai City Tour + Desert Safari
tours.description: Experience the best of Dubai with a city tour and thrilling desert safari adventure!
tours.description2: Experience the perfect combination of Dubai's urban wonders and desert adventures! Begin your day with a comprehensive city tour, exploring iconic landmarks like Dubai Creek, Dubai Museum, and Jumeirah Mosque. Capture stunning photos at Jumeirah Beach with the Burj Al-Arab as your backdrop, and marvel at the architectural wonders of the city. In the evening, embark on an exhilarating desert safari featuring dune bashing, camel riding, and sandboarding. Enjoy traditional entertainment, henna painting, and a delicious dinner buffet under the stars!

city_tour.burj_al_arab: Photo stop at Burj Al-Arab hotel

desert_safari.dune_bashing: 45 minutes of thrilling dune bashing in Lahbab desert
desert_safari.dinner: Dinner buffet with unlimited soft drinks, tea and coffee
desert_safari.entertainment: Traditional belly dance and Tanura dance show
